# federal holidays observed in the United States
#   - https://www.opm.gov/policy-data-oversight/pay-leave/federal-holidays/#url=2030
#
# the date format should not change because it is used as is in scripts
#
# 2030
2030/01/01 | 2030/01/21 | 2030/02/18 | 2030/05/27 | 2030/06/19 | 2030/07/04
2030/09/02 | 2030/10/14 | 2030/11/11 | 2030/11/28 | 2030/12/25
# 2029
2029/01/01 | 2029/01/15 | 2029/02/19 | 2029/05/28 | 2029/06/19 | 2029/07/04
2029/09/03 | 2029/10/08 | 2029/11/12 | 2029/11/22 | 2029/12/25
# 2028
2028/01/17 | 2028/02/21 | 2028/05/29 | 2028/06/19 | 2028/07/04
2028/09/04 | 2028/10/09 | 2028/11/10 | 2028/11/23 | 2028/12/25
# 2027
2027/01/01 | 2027/01/18 | 2027/02/15 | 2027/05/31 | 2027/06/18 | 2027/07/05
2027/09/06 | 2027/10/11 | 2027/11/11 | 2027/11/25 | 2027/12/24 | 2027/12/31
# 2026
2026/01/01 | 2026/01/19 | 2026/02/16 | 2026/05/25 | 2026/06/19 | 2026/07/03
2026/09/07 | 2026/10/12 | 2026/11/11 | 2026/11/26 | 2026/12/25
# 2025
2025/01/01 | 2025/01/20 | 2025/02/17 | 2025/05/26 | 2025/06/19 | 2025/07/04
2025/09/01 | 2025/10/13 | 2025/11/11 | 2025/11/27 | 2025/12/25

2024/09/02 | 2024/10/14 | 2024/11/11 | 2024/11/28 | 2024/12/25

2023/09/04 | 2023/10/09 | 2023/11/10 | 2023/11/23 | 2023/12/25

2022/09/05 | 2022/10/10 | 2022/11/11 | 2022/11/24 | 2022/12/26

2021/07/05 | 2021/09/06 | 2021/10/11 | 2021/11/11 | 2021/11/25 | 2021/12/24
2021/12/31
# 2020

2020/09/07 | 2020/10/12 | 2020/11/11 | 2020/11/26 | 2020/12/25

2019/09/02 | 2019/10/14 | 2019/11/11 | 2019/11/28 | 2019/12/25
